name: Honey Milk Hydrating Essence with Chamomile + Ceramides
about: What it is:¬†A nurturing milky essence that drenches skin in hydration as it comforts and calms redness...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Redness..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:- Hawaiian White Honey: Rich in antioxidants to help heal and nurture dry, irritated skin..- Potent Ceramide Blend: Replenishes moisture barrier, smooths the appearance of wrinkles, and visibly boosts elasticity..- Chamomile: Calms and soothes redness with immediate comfort...Ingredient Callouts: It is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This creamy, lightweight formula combines chamomile and Hawaiian-sourced white honey to nurture and soothe while ceramides strengthen skin‚Äôs moisture barrier for lasting hydration. It is formulated to prep for the rest of your skincare routine and layer underneath makeup as a dewy base...Clinical Results: Based on clinical testing on 34 subjects, after 1 use, immediately:.- Moisturizes to soothe redness..After 8 Hours:.- Replenishes all-day moisture..Based on clinical testing on 32 subjects, after 7 days:.- 93% showed a strengthened barrier..
ingredients: -Hawaiian White Honey: Rich in antioxidants to help heal and nurture dry, irritated skin..-Potent Ceramide Blend: Replenishes moisture barrier, smooths the appearance of wrinkles, and visibly boosts elasticity..-Chamomile: Calms and soothes redness with immediate comfort....Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate, Propanediol, Betaine, Isopentyldiol, Water/Aqua/Eau,Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol,Honey Extract/ Mel/ Extrait Demiel, Ceramide Np, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Panthenol, Squalane, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Arginine, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6,Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Glucomannan, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sucrose Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Maltodextrin....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing, apply to face AM and PM by pouring onto palms and pressing into skin. .-Follow with your serum and moisturizer. .-Avoid contact with eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favs! I have combination skin but have one dry patchy on my forehead. After years of trying different moisturizers, this is my fav. The dry patch on my face is almost totally healed. My face loves this product. It‚Äôs hydration and not oily. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is lovely and hydrating after I cleanse and before I do the rest of my skincare. I use it morning and night. If my skin is extra dry, I will use two layers of this‚Äîthe first layer, then let it soak in for a minute, and then I pat on a second layer. It makes a really big difference for my dry skin. In the mornings, I like the way my makeup goes on over top. I went through my first bottle very quickly but I will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out so bad‚Ä¶ painful under the skin pimples for me. Not even acne prone üôÅ

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been such a game changer for me! Very hydrating and I look forward to using it morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this brand, but this essence was not good for my skin. It burned every time I put it on, even though I do not have a damaged skin barrier. Sadly had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with very oily, sensitive skin this product is a must have in my routine!! It‚Äôs perfect for skin prep before makeup and hydrates my skin perfectly without making it oily. Extremely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this product as a sample, and loved it so much that I bought it in the full size. It feels good on my skin, and I only need a tiny bit to cover my whole face. This bottle will last me forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed!!! Perfect for dry skin. Doesn‚Äôt make me break out and I‚Äôve repurchased twice so far. Super hydrating. This brand is so underrated

reviews.review_title: it's a no for me sadly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first day I tried it, it was nice and my skin felt good. I tried it the 2nd day and I broke out in a rash, and my face just felt so so itchy...to the point that I was so looking forward to getting home from work so I could just run my face under cold water. I do have sensitive skin, but I haven't had a reaction like this in a long time! it sucks, but i'll have to give it away. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.review_title: Caused breakouts for my dry, sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this makes me break out pretty badly. I have very dry and sensitive skin and had to stop using this. Other than that, it does feel pretty hydrating and silky. If you don't have a reaction, seems like it would be a nice product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a couple of weeks and I love how gentle and soothing it is on my skin. I am very dry, and this adds some hydration before the rest of my morning routine. It is slightly milky and I apply it with my hands (don't waste product with a cotton round) and let it soak into my skin before using my serums. I will definitely buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product, but it made me breakout like I never have before! As soon as I stopped using it, my breakouts went away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ONLY Milk toner/essence on Sephora that is COMPLETELY acne safe with 0 pore cloggers I ran this one through my most trusted pore clogging ingredient checkers. I‚Äôm amazed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It's clean which is very important and cruelty free. It hydrates and the price is reasonable.  I just discovered Farmacy and will try the Honey Halo next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really great add on for when your skin is going through a rough patch and your moisturizer just isn't cutting it. This is really moisturizing where I feel like I can use this as my summer moisturizer, my skin just drinks this up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cause someone on the internet suggested it. Holy cow it went on fine felt nice and all but then a couple hours after application I touched my face and it was so smooth and hydrated this stuff is the magic I‚Äôve been missing. Will definitely be repurchasing so glad I went out on a limb and got it.  Ive got dry sensitive skin and am pregnant so I‚Äôm super picky and hard to please with skin care right now. This is the biggest win I‚Äôve had

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not wanna believe this overpriced water would make a difference but unfortunately my skin looks really good and its more hydrating than some moisturizers ive used. I have very dry skin and I like this a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to give the viral milk toners a shot. The first one I tried was the Laneige Cream Skin. However, my skin felt dehydrated, not to mention ruined bc it broke me out.  I tried this one next and it saved my skin. The consistency is top tier, it absorbs beautifully on the skin and sits even better under makeup. Definitely recommend for my sensitive skin girlies.
